scouting_report.tells: Defense aligns with safeties creeping up to play the run, anticipating short yardage run.
scouting_report.tendency: Offense utilizes aggressive Play Action on short yardage downs to exploit run-committed defenses for deep shots.
scouting_report.weakness: Single-high safety lacks discipline, biting hard on the play fake, leaving the cornerback isolated with no deep help.

grading.technique: QB executes a convincing hard play fake, freezes the safety, and delivers a precise deep ball. WR wins vertical leverage instantly.
grading.effort: Offensive line sells run blocking effectively; WR maximizes separation speed.

scouting_report.tells: Defense aligns with single-high safety creeping forward, anticipating a run to convert the short yardage.
scouting_report.tendency: Offense exploits defensive aggressiveness on 3rd & Short by utilizing max-protect Play Action to take vertical shots.
scouting_report.weakness: The deep safety lacks discipline, biting hard on the run fake, which leaves the post route undefended in the middle of the field.

grading.technique: QB executes a hard play fake to freeze the linebackers and safety; WR wins inside leverage instantly and stacks the DB.
grading.effort: Offensive line sells the run blocking to suck in the defense; WR displays elite separation speed after the catch.

scouting_report.tells: Defensive ends align in wide techniques (Wide 9) anticipating pass in empty set.
scouting_report.tendency: Offense utilizes empty formation to spread the defense horizontally, relying on 5-man protection holding up without chip help.
scouting_report.weakness: Right Tackle isolation against speed rush; lacks the foot speed to reach the deep set point against a wide-aligned edge rusher.

grading.technique: RT fails to gain sufficient depth in kick slide and opens the gate early. DE executes a clean speed rip move to turn the corner. QB cannot step up due to interior pocket collapse.
grading.effort: Poor protection effort on the right side; high motor by the defensive end to finish the play.

scouting_report.tells: Heavy personnel and under center alignment on 3rd & 1 signals run to the defense.
scouting_report.tendency: Offense uses short-yardage situations to take deep shots against aggressive run support.
scouting_report.weakness: Safety bites hard on the play action fake, leaving the deep middle of the field exposed and the CB with no help.

grading.technique: QB sells the handoff effectively; Receiver (Higgins) gets a clean release and stacks the DB.
grading.effort: Defense collapses on the line of scrimmage, failing to maintain deep integrity.

scouting_report.tells: DE #55 (Hunter) aligns in a Wide-9 technique, signaling a speed rush. LT #70 (Slater) sets deep with a vertical kick step.
scouting_report.tendency: Offense relies on standard 5-man protection on 3rd & medium, leaving tackles on an island.
scouting_report.weakness: LT #70 cannot match the bend and burst of DE #55 off the edge without chip help. QB #10 (Herbert) cannot step up or escape the pocket quickly enough when the blindside collapses.

grading.technique: LT #70 is beaten cleanly by #55's chop-and-rip move. QB #10 fails to sense the blindside pressure in time to throw away or scramble.
grading.effort: Relentless pursuit by DE #55 to secure the sack.
